## encode2HalfToRGBA() function

Encodes two half floats into a rgba8unorm

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function encode2HalfToRGBA(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, a: PBShaderExp | number, b: PBShaderExp | number): PBShaderExp;
```
